name: Unstatiq
headline: Single source of truth for your clinic's finances and supply chain.
description: There are billions of dollars of hospital waste caused by inefficient, disconnected supply chains and finance data. Today, clinics are facing unprecedented backorders, recalls, and purchase verticals (medical devices, SaaS, security, commodities). We are building a single product to 10x a fragmented industry with each tool built almost 20 years ago.

founders.name: Sachin Jaishankar, Founder
founders.description: Getting the right data in the right places

founders.name: Nish Singaraju, Founder
founders.description: Speeding up data integrations and transformations using AI.

generated_description:
Unstatiq is a forward-thinking company founded in 2022, nestled in the heart of San Francisco and proudly part of Y Combinator's Batch W23. The driving mission of Unstatiq is to create a "single source of truth" for the financial and supply chain aspects of clinics—something crucial as the healthcare sector battles inefficiencies that lead to billions of dollars wasted.

The inspiration behind Unstatiq's inception stemmed from the challenges faced by hospitals and clinics, especially today, as they grapple with issues like backorders, recalls, and a hodgepodge of purchasing verticals in medical devices, SaaS, and more. Their approach? To overhaul a fragmented industry by providing a cohesive product that modernizes tools that, frankly, have gone stale over the last couple of decades.

At its core, Unstatiq aims to streamline operations for managed care teams using cutting-edge AI technology. They facilitate the review of extensive contracts and policy manuals, making the task less daunting and far more efficient. And despite its small team of just two employees, the ambition at Unstatiq is massive—the goal is nothing short of revolutionizing how clinics manage their financial and supply chain data.

Guided by Group Partner Diana Hu and a strong vision, Unstatiq carries the taglines of 'health-tech', 'finance', 'B2B', 'supply chain', and proudly represents the San Francisco Bay Area tech ecosystem. If you're in the medical field looking for smarter financial solutions and supply chain management tools, Unstatiq might just be the partner you've been waiting for. You can learn more by visiting their website: [Unstatiq](https://www.unstatiq.com/).
